name: Change Font
description:
Change the font in FigJam and Figma files using the quick actions search bar.


The list displays of both Google Fonts and local fonts.


How to use:

  1. Select Text Layers, Connectors, Shapes with Text, Sticky Notes or Code Blocks, or select a specific piece of text.
  2. Launch Quick Actions (press "Cmd + /" on Mac or "Ctrl + /" on Windows).
  3. Write "Change Font" and press "Tab".
  4. Filter the list by typing the name of the font and select the desired font by pressing "Enter/Return".
  5. Done! Font applied.
